Hello,

I just setup the 2.0.0 version in Windows XP SP3 and was able to 
s=
tart the Jetty at 8080 with tweaks to the .cmd scripts provided. 
Here is a=
 summary of my script.

heritrix.cmd -a admin -w %Heritrix_HOME%\lib\webui-=
2.0.0.war

Of course, replace %Heritrix_HOME% with your home. The server ca=
me up 
OK but I do not see the default profiles in the web console. I have =

the jobs directory as 

%Heritrix_HOME%\conf\jobs\profile-basic_seed_sites=

%Heritrix_HOME%\conf\jobs\profile-broad_but_shallow

The web console does =
not show the profile and here is the output.

Active Jobs:
There are no act=
ive jobs on HOSTNAME:8849#21185076. 
Ready Jobs:
There are no ready jobs on=
 HOSTNAME:8849#21185076. 
Profiles:
Completed Jobs:
There are no completed =
jobs. 

I digg through this group and other places and noticed profile has =
to 
exist and it does exist. I thought it was looking for profiles 
directo=
ry and I created a directory called profiles and copied the 
content that e=
xist in jobs above. Still the same issue.

%Heritrix_HOME%\conf\profiles\pr=
ofile-basic_seed_sites
%Heritrix_HOME%\conf\profiles\profile-broad_but_shal=
low

Do I need to modify anything to the files manually that exist in JOBS =

directory? Please clarify. 

Thank you.
